title: After Election, Cautious Optimism That Few False Narratives Took Hold
description: Researchers who study disinformation said most efforts to stoke doubt about results had failed to spread widely.

title: Rivian Lost $1.7 Billion in the Third Quarter
description: The electric truck maker said it has enough cash to fund its operations through 2025.

title: Is This Crypto’s Lehman Moment?
description: Here’s how to make sense of the industry-shaking Binance-FTX deal.

title: Fall of a Crypto Titan Puts an Industry on Edge
description: The rapid collapse of the cryptocurrency exchange built by the billionaire Sam Bankman-Fried suggests that no company in the freewheeling, loosely regulated crypto industry is safe.

title: No, Elon Musk’s Twitter Did Not Perform at Its Best on Election Day
description: False narratives about voting in the midterm elections proliferated on the platform, which has shed half its employees since Mr. Musk bought the company last month.

title: Twitter Files Paperwork to Enter Payments Business
description: Elon Musk, Twitter’s new owner, has been looking for ways to generate more revenue at the social media company.

title: Meta Lays Off More Than 11,000 Employees
description: The parent of Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp reduced its work force by 13 percent and extended a hiring freeze through the first quarter of next year.

title: Smartphones Are Like Cars. So Why Don’t We Maintain Them?
description: Regularly replacing our phones takes a toll on our wallets and the environment. We should instead take care of them as we do our cars.

title: Patience, Please! Networks Urge Caution on a Chaotic Midterm Night.
description: “Wait for more votes,” warned CNN’s John King, as wary anchors tried to avoid any predictions that might go awry.
